level.heading: Incorporation and application of certain provisions of Chapter 20.
level.text: The provisions of §§ 47-2019 to 47-2021, 47-2023, 47-2024, and 47-2027 are hereby incorporated in and made applicable to this chapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 13-305 rewrote the section which had read:
"The provisions of §§ 47-2019 to 47-2025 and 47-2027 to 47-2032 are hereby incorporated in and made applicable to this chapter."

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Section 410(d) of D.C. Law 13-305 provides: "Section 406(a), (c), (j), (m), (p), (q), (s), (w), (bb), (dd), (ee), (hh) through (kk), (mm) through (oo), (qq) through (uu), (yy), (zz), (bbb), (ddd), and (fff) shall apply for all tax years or taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2000."
